wordpressPost.title: Arcade Fire, Lykke Li and more added to 2018 line-up
wordpressPost.excerpt: Day tickets and week passes for sale!
wordpressPost.content:
Lykke Li (SE) / Arcade Fire (CA) / Grizzly Bear (US) / Wolf Alice (UK) / J Hus (UK) / Superorganism (UK) / SASSY 009 / Tønes / Fieh

More artists to be announced in January. Check out the line up here!
